name: Valiant
description: Alternative version compatible with gameplay mods like Brutal Doom, Combined Arms, etc.
notes: Pwad file from Doomworld. Requires either the DOOM 2 or the Freedoom phase 2 iwad to play.

files.doom2: N/A:Please select either the DOOM 2 or Freedoom phase 2 iwad file.

content:
files:
- doom2: N/A:Please select either the DOOM 2 or Freedoom phase 2 iwad file.
- valiant: http://youfailit.net/pub/idgames/levels/doom2/Ports/megawads/valve.zip
game:
  files:
  - valve.wad
  main_file: $doom2
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $valiant
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $doom2
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/valve.wad
